resources.string: If you couldn\'t find your Place/Ministry when trying to Add a Site to your Adventist Place dashboard, send us the below information so we can add the Place\'s details to our master South Pacific Division database.

To-do list app allows you to write, organize, and reprioritize your tasks more efficiently. They also let you attach notes, links, and files to a task, and many let you know if someone else has completed a task. in many waysThe Good To-Do app is the ultimate productivity app.
